item.description:
I am a meet up organizer from Hudson, NH. I am writing to you
to ask if you would mind sharing the information regarding an
upcoming fund raiser for the NH Food Bank. It is a wonderful
Sound Healing Concert called Holiday Vibrations. We are trying
to get as many people as possible to be aware of this event.
The Advance Ticket Sales are only $14.00 if reserved prior to
Dec 1st. I thank you for taking the time to share this
information with your group and others that you may know who
may be interested in this performance.
Thank you.
Blessings,
Angie D'Anjou
603 912-5633
A Benefit for the NH Food Bank... "Holiday Vibrations" Sound
Healing Benefit Concert
Sunday, Dec 5, 2010 choose from 12:00pm performance or 4:00pm
performance
Location: Holiday Inn, 9 Northeastern Blvd., Nashua, NH
Visit www.crystaljadeshop for more details.
The performance last year was absolutely astounding! The four
major performers including Joseph Carringer,Didgeridoo
International Sound Healer Richard Gandiva Lorcan,
International Gong Master Healer, Bindy Johnson, international
Crystal Bowl Sound Healer, and Michael Longrider, Traditional
Flute player have created through their musical and spiritual
attitudes a remakable atmosphere that was enjoyed by all who
attended.

Be sure to allow yourself to experience this Holiday
Extravaganza! You will not be sorry! Feel the true peace of the
season! Absorb the Healing Energy and Re-Energize your mind,
body, & spirit!
A great way to help raise money for our local NH Food Bank!
We thank you for attending and donating to a great cause!
Blessings,
Angie D'Anjou, Event Coordinator

Two performance times to choose from scheduled at 12:00pm or 4:
00pm. Tickets are only $14.00 per person if purchased in
advance prior to Nov. 29, 2010. Tickets purchased after Nov
29th will be sold at the original price of $30.00 per person.
This is a benefit concert for the NH Food Bank. Call Angie at
603 912-5633 to order your advance discounted tickets today or
visit www.crystaljademetaphysical.com for further information
and order forms.

This year's performance will also include a special Opening
Performance by American-Israeli folksinger, RAHEL who will
share her unique Hebrew Chants in "free-verse" style award-
winning songs. The Main Concert performers include: Joseph
Carringer, Gandiva Lorcan, Bindy Johnson, and Michael Longrider
Joining together to bring all a delightfully relaxing and
inspiring healing concert.
In addition there will be a variety of unique gift items
available for purchase including CD's, Crystals, Hand Carved
Wooden Art & Flutes, Soy Candles, and a variety of other
merchandise.
All performers will be available before, between and after each
performance to meet with those who wish to learn more about
sound healing therapies, receive autographs, or purchase CD's.
item.name: A Benefit for the NH Food Bank... "Holiday Vibrations"
